column4: I hate to pushy, but incase my question was missed:Why does X skip over tty8 when allocation ttys for desktops?does any else notice this?
does X allocate the ttys? I thought that was handled by the base system
I think it is handle by gdm, to be specific.perhaps I should of mentioned that instead of X.
if that were the case, ubuntu server wouldn't have any ttys... since I doubt it has gdm
